src:
Hasil Pertandingan Persipura Jayapura vs Bhayangkara FC: 1-3
07 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bhayangkara FC sukses mengamankan tiga poin di pertandingan pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019. Menghadapi Persipura Jayapura di Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo, The Guardian berhasil mengalahkan Tim Mutiara Hitam dengan skor 3-1.
Gol kemenangan Bhayangkara FC dicetak Bruno Matos, Adam Alis dan Herman Dzumafo sementara tuan rumah memperkecil ketertinggalan berkat gol Ian Luis Kabes.
Pertandingan yang digelar di Sidoarjo itu berlangsung dengan menarik. Kedua tim sama-sama tancap gas untuk mengincar gol cepat.
Jual beli serangan terus terjadi sepanjang babak pertama. Namun kedua tim itu gagal mengonversi sejumlah peluang matang yang dimiliki mereka.
Jelang berakhirnya babak pertama, Bhayangkara FC sukses memecahkan kebuntuan. Adalah Bruno Matos yang mencatatkan namanya di papan skor setelah tembakan mendatarnya berhasil melewati kolong penjaga gawang Persipura, Dede Sulaiman. Skor 1-0 bertahan hingga turun minum babak pertama.

Baca jalannya pertandingan di babak kedua di bawah ini.
text:
Persipura Jayapura vs Bhayangkara FC results: 1-3
Nov 7 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bhayangkara FC successfully secured three points in Week 27 of Shopee Liga 1 2019 matches. Facing Persipura Jayapura at the Gelora Delta Sidoarjo Stadium, The Guardian defeated Team Mutiara Hitam with a score of 3-1.
Bhayangkara FC's winning goal was scored by Bruno Matos, Adam Alis and Herman Dzumafo while the hosts reduced the deficit thanks to goals from Ian Luis Kabes.
The match which was held in Sidoarjo took place interestingly. Both teams are both step on the gas to target fast goals.
Buying and selling attacks continued throughout the first half. But both teams failed to convert a number of mature opportunities they had.
Near the end of the first round, Bhayangkara FC successfully broke the deadlock. It was Bruno Matos who listed his name on the scoreboard after his flattening shot passed under the Persipura goalkeeper, Dede Sulaiman. Score 1-0 lasted until halftime first half.

Read the game in the second half below.
